artist: Painter: After Aert Van Der Neer; Engraver: Samuel William Reynolds I; Publisher: W. B. Cooke
description: evening river landscape with four figures on shore in forground on left; cattle and three figures on spit behind them; houses and horsemen along right shore; boats on river; windmill in background
inscription:
Signature, Title, Date and Inscription

below image in grey: Painted by Vander Neer,  Engraved by S.W. Reynolds/ Engraver to the King / CANAL SCENE BY MOONLIGHT / GEMS OF ART - PLATE 29 / London Published Sept\'r 1825 by W.B.ooke 9 Soho Square | in pencil on sheet: 2-124
title: Canal Scene by Moonlight
